# configuration

**Type Property**

A change that invalidates a view’s configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
static var configuration: UIView.Invalidations.Configuration { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this invalidation type to call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/setNeedsUpdateConfiguration()] when a change in property value should cause the containing view to update the configuration.



## Specifying invalidation types

- **constraints**: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.
- **display**: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.
- **intrinsicContentSize**: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.
- **layout**: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.
